mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, name, email, role, grade, total_credits, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{role}, COALESCE(#{grade}, 1), 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, role = #{role}, grade = #{grade}, total_credits = #{totalCredits}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
